content:
### **Phase 1 Execution Plan: Setting Up AI-Powered RAG System**  

We are now moving into **full execution mode** to build the AI memory system that will power everything.  

---
### **🛠 Step 1: Structuring Notion for AI Memory (Today)**
🔹 **Final Check:** Ensure all databases, relations, and tags are structured correctly.  
🔹 **Master Tag System:** Confirm global tagging consistency across Notion.  
🔹 **Test Query Structure:** Manually input a few key insights to see how retrieval will work.  

---
### **⚙ Step 2: Connecting AI to Notion (Today & Tomorrow)**
🔹 **Set Up Make.com / API Pipeline:** Build connection between Notion & OpenAI API.  
🔹 **Data Retrieval Testing:** Ensure AI can pull relevant data before responding.  
🔹 **Memory Refinement:** Adjust structure based on early testing results.  

---
### **🚀 Step 3: AI Querying & Retrieval (Saturday)**
🔹 **Automate Knowledge Access:** AI retrieves & ranks the best insights dynamically.  
🔹 **Personalized Decision-Making:** AI pulls the right insights to guide choices.  
🔹 **Start Logging New Learnings:** AI will begin automatically storing new insights.  

---
### **📌 Milestone: RAG Fully Operational by Sunday**
🔹 By Sunday, the system should be capable of **real-time AI memory retrieval** to guide our work.  
🔹 Once functional, we move to **AI-guided execution & monetization next week.**  

---
### **Next Steps:**
✅ **Confirm Notion is fully structured** – Do a final check now.  
✅ **Begin Make.com setup & Notion API connection** – Will guide step-by-step.  
✅ **Test AI query & retrieval** – Ensuring accuracy and relevance.  

Let me know if Notion is fully set up, and we’ll move straight to Step 2!
